charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
the beach one day, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across N and
Zoroark seemingly having a good time.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Did you come here
for a walk, too?
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0300_10:
The breeze feels nice, doesn’t it? This is a great
spot to take a break.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0400_10: I was listening to what Zoroark had to say.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0500_10: Back in Unova, Zoroark lent me his power.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0600_10:
And ever since, he’s a Pokémon with whom I’ve
had a strong bond.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0700_10:
Oh, that’s right. While we’re on the subject,
would you like to hear something interesting
about Zoroark?
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0800_10:
You may already know, but Zoroark is a Pokémon
that cares deeply about others of its kind.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_0900_10:
They try to protect their pack when anyone
approaches their den.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_1000_10:
And how they do it is so characteristic!
They conjure illusions to drive people away.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_0401_1200_10: I think they don’t want to fight with humans.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_0302_1300_10: Do they not like to fight?
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_1500_10:
They don’t yet fully understand humans, but they
want to, so they respect our boundaries as they
learn more about us.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_1700_10: The ideals I seek... I think I see them in Zoroark.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_1800_10:
To have a world in which people and Pokémon
trust and help each other...
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_1900_10:
Zoroark and I need to keep enjoying our time on
Pasio.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_2000_10:
The key to an ideal world is to deepen our
friendships with many people and Pokémon—
and seek out the boundaries between us.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_2100_10: Ah, sorry. I’m starting to ramble.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_2200_10:
It’s a difficult topic. Perhaps we can discuss it
some other time.
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_2300_10:
Now, allow me to show you the strength of my
bond with Zoroark...
charaepi_ch0089_90_n/2301_1201_2400_10:
with our proof—the arc suit Zoroark and I
awakened together!
